conbody.p: (5) When notified of a complaint of reprisal described in DFARS 5203.903(1), the contracting officer shall notify the Office of General Counsel by email at https://psctool.us with a courtesy copy to DASN(P) by email ahttps://psctool.ust with the subject “DFARS 203.903 – Notification of a Complaint of Reprisal.”
